instruction: Suggest a 5-step plan to develop a budget-friendly healthy meal.
output:
1. Make a list of budget-friendly groceries such as canned goods, frozen vegetables and fruit, beans, and eggs. 
2. Try to make a shopping list that relies heavily on plant-based options and look for recipes with the most variety in the ingredients.
3. Calculate costs by adding up the price per serving for all of your groceries.
4. Strategically plan meals by adding some of the same ingredients to multiple recipes to reduce the cost of the meal. 
5. Stick to the plan by preparing meals ahead of time and adding meat or fish sparingly to make the meals stretch.
